Package gui

Class VecCanvas

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • gui.VecCanvas
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
    public class VecCanvas
extends javax.swing.JPanel
    The GUI component for the canvas. Singleton design pattern for a shared instance across application.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • paintComponent

        public void paintComponent​(java.awt.Graphics g,
                           int width,
                           int height)
        Paints the canvas using the draw method for all the DrawableVectors in contained instructions with enforced dimensions. (Used for exporting)
        Parameters:
        g - passed Graphics object
        width - width of component to draw to
        height - height of component to draw to
